CustomField.description: Used for converting the "Financial Product Type " field into an ID to update the financial product through a process builder
CustomField.formula:
CASE( Financial_Product_Type__c , "Accident, Sickness & Unemployment","0121t0000001eUeAAI", "Annuity","0121t0000001eSxAAI", "AVC","0121t0000001eRcAAI", "BPR","0121t0000001eP8AAI", "BPR ISA","0121t0000001eO4AAI", "Cash ISA","0121t0000001eN1AAI", "Current Account","0121t0000001eKxAAI", "Defined Benefit Pension","0121t0000001eQuAAI", "Direct equity holding","0121t0000001ePyAAI", "Direct Gilt/bond holding","0121t0000001eQ8AAI", "EIS","0121t0000001eObAAI", "Endowment","0121t0000001eVCAAY", "Fixed Term Deposit","0121t0000001eLbAAI", "General Investment Account (GIA)","0121t0000001ePeAAI", "Group Personal Pension (GPP)","0121t0000001eSFAAY", "Income Protection","0121t0000001eUZAAY", "Junior ISA","0121t0000001l9AAAQ", "Life Cover (Term)","0121t0000001eUvAAI", "Life Cover (Whole of Life & CIC)","0121t0000001eWBAAY", "Life Cover (Whole of Life)","0121t0000001eVYAAY", "Life Cover & CIC (Term)","0121t0000001eU7AAI", "Mortgage","0121t000000vGJNAA2", "Occupational/Company Pension Scheme","0121t0000001eRRAAY", "Offshore Bond","0121t0000001eMjAAI", "Peer-Peer / Innovative finance","0121t0000001ePOAAY", "Peer-Peer / Innovative finance ISA","0121t0000001eN6AAI", "Personal Pension (PP)","0121t0000001eRhAAI", "Private Medical","0121t0000001eWLAAY", "Retirement Annuity Contract (RAC)","0121t0000001eSaAAI", "SASS","0121t0000001eRmAAI", "Savings Account","0121t000000vGJQAA2", "Scheme Pension","0121t0000001eTLAAY", "Section 32","0121t0000001eSVAAY", "SEIS","0121t0000001eOgAAI", "SIPP","0121t0000001eRHAAY", "Stakeholder Pension","0121t0000001eSKAAY", "Stocks & Shares ISA","0121t0000001eNHAAY", "Structured Product","0121t0000001ePoAAI", "Structured Product ISA","0121t0000001eNRAAY", "VCT","0121t0000001eO9AAI", "VCT ISA","0121t0000001eNuAAI",
"0121t0000001eUeAAI")
CustomField.label: Financial Product Record Type Conversion
